name: Travel Visa Requirement Checker
meta_description: The Travel Visa Requirement Checker is an essential tool for international travelers seeking to navigate the complex world of visa regulations. This versatile widget streamlines the process of gathering vital visa information for multiple countries in a single query. By inputting their citizenship, a list of countries they plan to visit, and the total duration of their trip, users receive a comprehensive PDF report detailing the visa requirements for each destination. Leveraging the power of OpenAI's GPT model, the widget provides up-to-date information on visa types, processing times, associated fees, and any current COVID-19 related entry requirements. It also includes links to official government websites for further verification and application processes. The generated PDF is neatly organized, presenting the information in a clear, easy-to-read format, making it an invaluable resource for trip planning. Whether you're a frequent business traveler, a digital nomad, or planning a multi-country vacation, this widget saves time and reduces the stress of researching visa requirements. It's particularly useful for those embarking on extended trips or visiting multiple countries with varying entry regulations. By consolidating all necessary visa information into a single document, the Travel Visa Requirement Checker ensures that users are well-prepared for their international adventures, helping to avoid any last-minute surprises or entry complications

name: Simple Sentiment Analyzer
meta_description: HOW TO USE: upload a file named urls.txt, where you will have links on each line of different articles or internet pages that you might want sentiment analysis on. For example the file could look like this:www.link1.com/interesting-articlewww.link2.ge/much-more-interesting-articleABOUT: This project is a web scraping and sentiment analysis tool designed to extract articles from online sources and analyze their emotional tone. It starts by taking one or more article URLs as input, which can be provided through an environment variable called urls. If no input is given, it falls back to a default example. The tool uses a built-in web scraper to download the content of each article and save it as a text file. It then processes the text using three sentiment analysis methods: VADER, Naive Bayes, and TextBlob. The results include both a short preview of the article and a breakdown of the sentiment scores. All outputs, including individual analysis files and a summary report, are saved to the output folder. This setup makes it easy to run the tool as a standalone script or deploy it in environments like AbyssHub, where input is passed through environment variables and outputs are collected from a specific folder.

name: Legal Fee Calculator
meta_description: Legal Fee Calculator: Professional Cost Estimation Tool  This sophisticated widget helps businesses and individuals estimate legal service costs with precision and clarity. By analyzing key factors such as service type, document complexity, location, and attorney experience level, it generates comprehensive fee estimates tailored to specific legal needs.  Key Features: - Interactive input system for service details - Smart cost calculation based on market rates - Location-aware pricing adjustments - Professional PDF report generation - Detailed breakdown of estimated costs - Additional fees and expenses analysis - Cost-saving recommendations - Key questions for attorney consultations  The tool leverages OpenAI's GPT-4 technology to provide context-aware estimates, considering regional variations in legal fees and service complexity. The generated PDF report includes a detailed cost analysis, estimated time requirements, hourly rate ranges, and potential additional expenses. Each report is professionally formatted with clear sections, making it easy to understand and share with stakeholders.  Perfect for: - Small business owners seeking legal services - Corporate legal department budgeting - Individuals planning for legal representation - Law firms providing initial cost estimates - Legal consultants and paralegals  The widget emphasizes transparency in legal cost estimation while providing practical insights for managing legal expenses effectively. Its user-friendly interface and detailed output make it an invaluable tool for anyone needing to understand and plan for legal service costs.

name: Cryptocurrency Backtesting Tool
meta_description: Backtesting Tool with Multiple Indicators for Trading Strategies Deploy your powerful cryptocurrency backtesting tool that supports multiple indicators like EMA, SMA, RSI, MACD and Bollinger Bands. This tool utilizes Binance API to provide accurate historical data for backtesting various crypto trading strategies. Featuring a rich editor, it allows you to generate and customize detailed PDF reports. Perfect for traders and analysts, this application is ideal for those looking to optimize their trading strategies by analyzing various financial indicators. You can use it to perform backtesting on popular trading pairs like BTC/USDT, ETH/USDT, and many others. The tool is capable of handling multiple timeframes such as 15m, 1h, 4h, and daily charts, providing in-depth analysis on different market conditions. The app offers an automated PDF report generation feature that creates comprehensive summaries of each backtesting run. The generated reports include metrics like win rate, final amount, risk percentage, and indicator settings used. This ensures you have a clear and professional summary of your analysis that can be shared or referenced. Additionally, this tool supports a risk management system, allowing you to set a customizable risk percentage per trade, making it easier to align backtesting results with real-life trading strategies. Whether you are a beginner or a seasoned trader, this application helps refine your trading edge by providing data-backed insights. Analyze risk, calculate win rates, assess profitability, and fine-tune strategies effectively with Python-based financial tools and comprehensive metrics. This app is perfect for crypto enthusiasts who want to deepen their understanding of technical indicators, track historical performance, and build more efficient trading models.

name: Sharepoint Scraper
meta_description: Sure, this is a Python script designed to act as a scraper for a specific Microsoft Office 365 SharePoint site.  The project aims to synchronize with Google Chat and Google Meet integration for Graph8's virtual office application. It involves a series of tasks such as debugging Google OAuth 2.0, resolving SSL/TLS issues, and integrating seamless chat and meet functionality based on Google API. It uses the requests library to interact with the Microsoft Graph API and retrieves a list of files, folders, and content pages from the SharePoint site. The data acquired (including name, URL, type, and last modification) are regularly updated and stored in two .csv files. Additionally, the script handles downloading files from SharePoint to the local system, preserving the original SharePoint folders structure for every newly added or updated file. The code heavily relies on Google OAuth 2.0 for user authorization, Netlify Functions for serverless operations, and Firebase for the database aspect of the project. In summary, this script is developed as an essential tool for streamlining collaborative efforts and ensuring up-to-date resources are available from a shared Office 365 SharePoint Directory.

name: Create Strong Passwords

The widget randomly picks characters from each category. It shuffles everything so it‚Äôs not predictable. It returns a final secure password like: A8@b7RkL

name: Content Generator Widget
meta_description: The Content Generator Widget is a versatile tool designed to create high-quality, customized written content on demand. This powerful widget leverages advanced language models to produce articles, blog posts, reports, and various other types of content tailored to specific requirements. Key features of the widget include: 1. Flexible content type selection (e.g., article, blog post, report) 2. Topic specification for targeted content generation 3. Adjustable word count to suit different content needs 4. Tone customization (e.g., professional, casual, informative) 5. Target audience specification for appropriate content framing 6. Additional instruction input for fine-tuned content creation The widget uses sophisticated natural language processing to ensure the generated content is coherent, well-structured, and relevant to the specified topic. It can handle a wide range of subjects, making it suitable for various industries and purposes. The output includes proper formatting with headings, subheadings, and bullet points where appropriate. This tool is particularly useful for content creators, marketers, researchers, and anyone needing to produce written material efficiently. It can significantly reduce the time and effort required for content creation while maintaining high quality and relevance. The widget's ability to adapt to different tones and target audiences makes it invaluable for crafting content that resonates with specific reader groups. While the widget generates content automatically, it's designed to work alongside human creativity and expertise. Users can refine and edit the generated content to add their unique insights and ensure it aligns perfectly with their needs. This balance of automation and human touch makes the Content Generator Widget an indispensable asset in today's fast-paced content creation landscape.

name: Self-Care Widget
meta_description: The Self-Care Randomizer is a Python-based tool designed to generate personalized self-care activity suggestions based on a user‚Äôs current mood and available time. Leveraging OpenAI‚Äôs GPT-3.5-turbo model, it creates a diverse set of eight practical, actionable activities across four categories: physical, mindfulness, creative, and indulgence. Each activity includes a title, step-by-step instructions, a category label, and, where applicable, a verified resource link from a reputable source (confirmed via real-time web search). The widget outputs these suggestions as a professionally formatted PDF report, complete with a timestamped filename, styled tables, and a footer with the generation date. Key features include:  Ideal for individuals seeking quick, tailored self-care ideas or developers building wellness-focused applications, this widget combines AI-driven personalization with practical output in an easy-to-use package. The generated PDF is saved in an "output" directory, making it convenient for immediate access or sharing.

name: The Gift Idea Generator
meta_description: The Gift Idea Generator is an intelligent tool designed to simplify the often challenging process of finding the perfect gift. By leveraging OpenAI's GPT technology, this widget transforms basic information about a recipient into a comprehensive list of personalized gift suggestions. Users can input key details including: - Recipient's age - Budget constraints - Areas of interest (e.g., technology, sports, art, music) - Items the recipient already owns (to avoid duplicates) The widget processes this information through OpenAI's API to generate 10 thoughtfully curated gift suggestions. Each suggestion includes: - Item name and description - Estimated price within the specified budget - Detailed product description - Recommended retailers or websites for purchase The results are automatically compiled into a professional PDF report, stored in an 'output' directory with a timestamp. This report serves as a convenient reference guide, making it easy to compare options and make an informed decision. Key features: - AI-powered personalized recommendations - Budget-conscious suggestions - Consideration of existing possessions - Professional PDF report generation - Environment variable support for automated processing - Error handling and input validation - Flexible input methods (command line or environment variables) Perfect for occasions like birthdays, holidays, or special events, this widget streamlines the gift-selection process while ensuring thoughtful, personalized recommendations that align with the recipient's interests and your budget constraints.

name: Simple deposit (or loan) calculator
meta_description: The simplest deposit (or credit) calculator. Waiver: The amount of accrued interest may slightly differ from the real values you get from your bank, because different banks use different methods for calculation (e.g., at which step to apply rounding). It may also depend on local legislation (e.g. the approach fact/fact of 30/360 can be used). The widget calculates the final amount based on the initial amount, the deposit duration, the annual percentage rate, and the compounding. There is also the option for an additional benefit: to receive a monthly schedule in a separate CSV file. As the widget is a really simple calculator, it has limited functionality. For instance, it works only with integer inputs (principal amount, duration, rate). No taxes are calculated. In case you need a robust calculator for business purpose, which consider all the business and legal requirements, it can be developed upon request.
